summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 4.0 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 9684 lux) and cloud levels (up 330 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15086 lux), cloud levels (up 1910 m), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 330.4m lower than yesterday, 839.3m lower than the past week, 1909.7m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 713m minimum and 1594m maximum, with an average of 736.6m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1575.9m and 2650m.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and near calm conditions. Moderate rainfall, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and it’s dim outside. Weather could become unsettled.
